data.name: Oops!!! Puzzles!!!
data.detailed_description:
Puzzle game, which is a mosaic that you want to make up of many fragments of a picture of different shapes. Is one of the most affordable toys, developing logical thinking, attention, memory, imagination. Such wonderful pictures are very useful for the development of thinking and cognitive abilities. According to psychologists, the game of puzzles promotes the development of creative and logical thinking, arbitrary attention, perception, in particular, the distinction of individual elements in color, shape, size, etc.; teaches the right to perceive the relationship between the part and the whole.


Peculiar properties:
-progress;
-nice graphics;
- easy mouse control;
- interesting gameplay;
- light music;
- unforgettable adventure;
- available in 2 languages.

  • Graphics: 1 GB
